personal_info.name: Sai Teja Reddy
personal_info.title: AI/ML Engineer & Data Scientist
personal_info.summary: Experienced AI/ML Engineer with 5+ years of production experience in machine learning, deep learning, and data science. Passionate about using technology to solve real-world problems and help others through education and innovation.
personal_info.tagline: Building AI solutions that make a difference ðŸš€

core_competencies: LLM Fine-Tuning, Prompt Engineering & Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
Real-Time Predictive Analytics & Data Streaming (Kafka, Spark, Hive)
NLP Systems for Intent Classification, Summarization, Named Entity Recognition
Model Evaluation, Optimization & Explainability (F1, AUC, SHAP, LIME)
Forecasting & Anomaly Detection in Time Series Data
CI/CD Pipelines, Containerization, MLflow, FastAPI & DevOps Tools
Cloud-Native AI on AWS, GCP & Azure
Data Wrangling, Feature Engineering, SQL Automation & Airflow ETL
Ethical AI, Data Governance & Privacy-Safe Model Design
Agile Development, Sprint Planning, & Cross-Functional Team Collaboration
Business Storytelling, Technical Documentation & Stakeholder Engagement

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
responsibilities: Designed, deployed, and maintained large-scale AI applications focused on real-time decision systems for telecom networks, supporting 100M+ customer events daily
Fine-tuned transformer-based LLMs for conversational bots handling network diagnostics using domain-specific corpora, reducing customer query resolution time by 41%
Developed custom tokenizers and vector stores to support semantic search on customer knowledge bases, improving top-3 hit accuracy to 92%
Led integration of retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) with LangChain into Ericsson's internal knowledge platform using Pinecone and FAISS
Delivered predictive modeling pipelines in AWS SageMaker to forecast radio signal degradation using 6+ months of real-time telemetry logs
Automated daily ML workflows via Airflow and integrated CI/CD using MLflow + Docker + GitHub Actions. Reduced model deployment lag from 5 days to under 6 hours
Conducted SHAP-based explainability audits for regulatory review of AI models in telecom automation
Partnered with security teams to implement model guardrails and monitor data drift, ensuring continued fairness and robustness
Led internal enablement sessions on LangChain-based RAG pipelines, prompt tuning workflows, and deployment best practices across multiple AI teams
achievements: Recognized as the go-to technical resource for all AI/ML initiatives within the North America division
Received cross-team recognition for model reproducibility and deployment standards
Presented research outcomes at internal innovation day

experience.title: Data Scientist
responsibilities: Developed predictive credit scoring models using XGBoost and LightGBM that outperformed legacy logistic regression baselines, leading to a 23% reduction in loan default rates
Engineered over 70 features from transactional, demographic, and behavioral datasets to improve customer segmentation and targeting
Created real-time API for fraud detection scoring using Flask and integrated with internal loan processing application, reducing application fraud by 18%
Built dynamic dashboards in Tableau and Power BI for ongoing loan performance monitoring and risk forecasting
Automated ETL jobs using Python and Airflow to maintain pipeline reliability across multiple third-party data ingestion sources
Designed and conducted experiment-based uplift modeling to identify optimal email reminders for late payment reductions, increasing recovery rates by 12%
achievements: Received internal spotlight award for designing the AI-driven fraud engine adopted across three branches

experience.title: Data Analyst
responsibilities: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to collect, validate, clean, and model customer sales and operational data, identifying revenue leakages
Developed reports and dashboards using Power BI and Excel to track key performance indicators, supporting monthly executive strategy meetings
Built customer lifetime value (CLTV) models using regression techniques and helped marketing teams run targeted loyalty campaigns
Created Excel-based simulators to forecast costs and returns of marketing campaigns under various budget scenarios
Supported cross-functional process automation initiative resulting in ~8% time savings per quarter in reporting operations

experience.title: Graduate Assistant - Admissions
responsibilities: Built Excel automation tools that reduced application processing time by 40%
Conduct website audits and pitch campaign ideas for student recruitment
Create comprehensive student guides for visa applications and university processes
Provide technical support for admissions database and CRM systems
Assist international students with application processes and documentation

achievements: Perfect mathematics scores (300/300) in high school
Top 1% in national competitive examinations
Founded robotics club and led IEEE student chapter activities

projects.title: LLM Classification Fine-Tuning
projects.description: Designed and implemented a complete fine-tuning pipeline for binary classification of instruction prompt pairs using Hugging Face Transformers with DistilBERT
achievements: Preprocessed 5,000+ prompt-completion pairs with pairwise formatting and token-level encoding
Achieved 87% accuracy on validation set using optimized hyperparameters
Created modular, reusable codebase for rapid experimentation and prototyping
Implemented comprehensive evaluation metrics and model performance tracking

projects.title: HCU Speech Recognition Challenge
projects.description: Developed a multilingual speech recognition and translation pipeline combining Thai ASR and English translation using state-of-the-art transformer models
achievements: Integrated airesearch/wav2vec2-large-xlsr-53-th for Thai automatic speech recognition
Implemented Helsinki-NLP/opus-mt-th-en for accurate Thai-to-English translation
Built end-to-end pipeline processing audio files with real-time transcription and translation
Validated system across dialect-influenced audio samples and tone-heavy pronunciations

projects.title: Amazon Reviews Fine-Tuning
projects.description: Implemented parameter-efficient fine-tuning using LoRA (Low-Rank Adaptation) on GPT-2 for sentiment-aware text generation on Amazon product reviews
achievements: Reduced trainable parameters by 99% while maintaining model performance
Implemented 8-bit quantization for memory-efficient training
Created comparative analysis between full fine-tuning and parameter-efficient methods
Generated contextually relevant product review completions

projects.title: Bus Identification for Vision Impaired
projects.description: IoT solution helping visually impaired individuals identify approaching buses through audio announcements at bus stations
achievements: Designed RF-based communication between buses and bus stops
Implemented real-time audio announcement system
Created backup phone-based notification system
Received university innovation award for social impact
projects.impact: Improved accessibility and independence for visually impaired commuters

projects.title: Smart Shopping Trolley
projects.description: Automated checkout system using sensor technology to detect items added/removed from shopping carts, enabling seamless store experiences
achievements: Developed real-time item detection and cart management
Integrated with store inventory and billing systems
Reduced checkout time by 60% in pilot testing
Created user-friendly interface for customers and staff

projects.title: Mobile Phone Detector
projects.description: RF-based detection system for identifying unauthorized mobile phone usage in restricted areas like examination halls or secure facilities
achievements: Accurately detects mobile phone frequencies within 10-meter radius
Implemented adjustable sensitivity for different security levels
Created both audio and visual alert mechanisms
Successfully deployed in educational institutions

Strong problem-solving mindset with mathematical thinking
Excellent communicator who can explain complex concepts simply
Team player who enjoys helping others succeed
Adaptable and quick to pick up new skills and frameworks

philosophy.career_mission: To use artificial intelligence and technology to solve meaningful problems, educate others, and create positive impact in society while continuously learning and growing as both a technologist and human being.
core_values: Education is the key to everything and everyone deserves access to quality learning
Technology should be used to lift people up and solve real-world problems
Continuous learning and adaptation are essential in the rapidly evolving AI field
Helping others succeed creates a ripple effect of positive change
Authenticity and honesty are crucial in both personal and professional relationships
Hard work combined with smart work leads to exceptional results
life_goals: Adopt and provide quality education to 10 underprivileged children
Build AI systems that have meaningful social impact
Become a recognized thought leader in ethical AI development
Establish educational programs for rural and underserved communities
Contribute to space exploration through AI and technology
Maintain strong relationships with family and friends while pursuing ambitions

contact_preferences.availability: Open to opportunities in AI/ML, Data Science, and Technology Leadership roles

testimonials.quote: Sai consistently delivered exceptional results and became our go-to expert for complex AI implementations. His ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders was invaluable.
Sai's mathematical aptitude and innovative thinking were evident from day one. His projects always went beyond requirements and showed real-world application potential.
Working with Sai was a pleasure. He not only delivered great technical solutions but also helped the entire team understand the 'why' behind our AI models.
